title: Black/Blank loading screen (MAC)
body:
I'm trying to play a game. I queue. I pick a champ. Then we go into loading screen and it is blank/black. 

I have re DL client but still no love. 

Advices?

replies.body: I'm in the same boat. No matter how many times I relog, repair, reinstall, It still freezes at a black loading screen. My PBE account can play games so its not my network as it says it is.

Hey Zerandah,

How long has the issue been happening for?  There area a couple of possibilities that are worth checking out - Black screen on loading into game can be a sign of a couple of things: 

1. Connection issues with the LoL game server.  See [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some things you can try here.
2. Driver issues or a corrupt LoL install.  Check out [Bug Splat and Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) for things you can do to make sure your install is clean and computer fully up to date.

A further step I'd suggest if these things don't work would be to [get in touch with player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know how you go

Cheers
Mindstar
